name: subsea
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
existing or happening below the surface of the sea: Gas is transported from the production platforms along subsea pipelines. Norway has a number of sub-sea road tunnels. Synonym
undersea
More examplesFewer examplesA subsea cable delivers the energy to where it is needed.Subsea oil wells are located below the ocean floor.Global warming may cause Siberia's subsea permafrost to thaw.On the ocean floor, the submarine's floodlights revealed entirely new ecosystems living near the subsea volcanic vents.
